ComicInfo.Title: The Fear Eaters - Part Three
ComicInfo.Summary:
Heroes and villains unite to battle a terrifying cosmic onslaught! The key to victory lies with Black Panther, but will he be able to overcome his past in order to do so? The conclusion to another action-packed story arc!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Jon Sommariva | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Siobhan Keenan | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-24 13:14:53. [CVDB732567]
ComicInfo.Characters: Black Panther, Black Widow, Captain America, Carol Danvers, Hank Pym, Hawkeye, Hulk, Iron Man, Kkallakku, Madame Masque, Scarlet Witch, Spider-Man, Thor, Vision, Wasp
